prompts.prompt: Create a high-conversion 1:1 ecommerce thumbnail for women’s white platform sneakers (Tenis Barbara). Studio product photography look. Show ONE pair of the exact white platform lace-up sneakers, synthetic upper, thick platform sole, minimal urban style, no logos. Hero product large and sharp, 3/4 angle, slightly elevated to emphasize the discreet platform height. Background: clean light-to-mid gray gradient with subtle shadow under the shoes for stability. Add a minimal vertical measuring guide silhouette behind the shoe (abstract, not a person) to suggest visual height, with soft blur so the shoe remains the sharpest element. Lighting: crisp softbox, high contrast edges, clean whites without clipping. Leave clear space top-left for headline and top-right for badges. No people, no faces, no extra products.

composition_rules.focus: Product must be the largest and sharpest element; platform sole clearly visible; no competing props.
composition_rules.text_legibility: All text must sit on clean negative space with high contrast; keep within 10% safe margins; avoid overlapping key shoe details.

prompts.negative_prompt: Do not add brand logos, watermarks, store names, or copyrighted elements. No people, no faces, no hands, no models. No extra shoes beyond one pair. No exaggerated XL platform, no high heels, no different sneaker model. No busy backgrounds, no clutter, no low contrast, no blur on product, no harsh reflections, no overexposed whites, no incorrect colors (must be white sneaker). No misleading claims like exact cm height, comfort tech not provided, or medical/orthopedic claims.
